title: An Act studying discrimination in public accommodation for individuals with service animals

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Lovely, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2714) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Joan B. Lovely for legislation to study discrimination in public accommodation for individuals with service animals.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.
